I can give 5 stars to this.. I did not thought Top load machines will remove dirt. My wife observed only oil stain was not removed on jute bag. Thats okay. Maintenance.. is less.. 1. Plug and Play ( no need of installation). 2. Spinner removes the water and almost dries them out .. I could say 90% water removal. 3. No need to stand 4. You can lift it and place it any where you want. From my end, I could see little manual work is needed when compared to top load washing machine. I say that is okay for me as maintenance will be more in front load washing machine. Lets hope for the best and I assume machine will not give troubles in the future .. I mean atleast for next 6 months. Company provides 2 year warranty on the machine.
